nodes.text: The Second Battle of Epiphany was a battle which took place at the Epiphany, the outermost of three planets orbiting a red dwarf star in the Corporate Sector's Salient system. The fighting took place during the reign of the Galactic Empire and the first years of the TIE pilot Soran Keize's service in the Imperial Starfighter Corps. Having been involved in the battle, Keize looked back on the battle as one of the events which taught him the responsibility he had to protect the lives of his cohorts in order to protect those of even more.
The Second Battle of Epiphany was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
